recap_documents.description: BRIEF FILED for Appellant Affinity Labs of Texas, LLC [26]. Number of Pages: 61. Service: 09/29/2015 by email. Pursuant to ECF-10, filer is directed to file six copies of the brief in paper format. The paper copies of the brief should be received by the court on or before 10/13/2015. Appellees DIRECTV, LLC, Directv Digital LLC, MLB Advanced Media, Inc., MLB Advanced Media, L.P., NBA Media Ventures, LLC, NHL Enterprises, Inc., NHL Enterprises, L.P., NHL Interactive Cyber Enterprises, Llc and Turner Digital Basketball Services, Inc. brief is due 11/12/2015. cause: 28:2254 Ptn for Writ of H/C - Stay of Execution
firm: Federal Public Defender, Capital Habeas Unit
State of Ohio Office of the Attorney General, Capital Crimes
Office of the Ohio Attorney General, Criminal Justice Section, Capital Crimes Unit
Federal Public Defenders Office, Capital Habeas Unit

recap_documents.description: REPORT AND RECOMMENDATIONS - It is respectfully recommended that grounds for relief one through thirty-seven, thirty-nine, and forty be dismissed with prejudice and that grounds for relief thirty-eight, forty-one, and forty-two be dismissed without p rejudice.  Under Rule 11 of the Rules Governing § 2254 Cases, the Court must in any final judgment adverse to the Petitioner make a determination on whether a certificate of appealability should issue as to any claim. No recommendation is made o n that question herein because the parties have not yet briefed the question. A schedule for such briefing will be set after any objections to this Report are resolved. Objections to R&R due by 9/28/2020.  Signed by Magistrate Judge Michael R. Merz on 9/14/2020. (kpf)
